section.title: NTFS
section.para: This module create a tree from a NTFS file system, for regular and delete/orphan files. It also provides human-readable dump of MFT or indexex entries.

itemizedlist.listitem: advanced-attributes : [activatable] Display advanced attributes as nodes attributes
drive-name : [activatable] Use this drive name to link reparse point and symlink
file : Path to a file containing NTFS
no-bootsector-check : [activatable] If set the module will continue even if the bootsector is corrupted
recovery : [activatable] if set the module will to recover file by carving MFT in unallocated clusters
